short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click and search words in video captions. Currently supported on YouTube, Netflix and PrimeVideo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to know the meaning of word in captions quickly. Really helpful when learning a foreign language.
